home.bio: Product Manager and Software Engineer with over 4 years of experience. I founded RM Consult to provide high-quality software consulting for companies seeking to optimize processes and achieve operational excellence. São Paulo, Brazil.

about.title: Davi Rezende
about.subtitle: Full Stack Developer & Founder at RM Consult
about.location: São Paulo, Brazil · 4+ years of experience
about.aboutText: Product Manager and Software Engineer with experience in software consulting, technical leadership and product delivery. I founded RM Consult with the vision of providing high-quality consulting solutions for companies seeking to optimize processes and achieve operational excellence. I work at specialist level in engineering and technical roles, with experience in IT management and tech lead.

trajectory.ferreira: IT Manager, Tech Lead, Full Stack, Frontend and internship (2022 – 2025)

certs.scrum: Agile projects with SCRUM — Digital Innovation One (2022)
